  dev.args=list(bg = "transparent", family = "Lato"),
  echo = FALSE,

# Alternative image insertions

## Morphology (LMD) 2 {.centered}

```{r morph2}
myimg <- png::readPNG("images/N1.png")
myplot <- ggplot2::qplot(rnorm(100))

# set viewport
grid.newpage()
pushViewport(grid::viewport(layout = grid::grid.layout(2, 2)))

# print
print(myplot, vp = viewport(layout.pos.col = 1, layout.pos.row = 1))
grid.raster(myimg, vp = viewport(layout.pos.col = 1, layout.pos.row = 2))
print(myplot, vp = viewport(layout.pos.col = 2, layout.pos.row = 2))
grid.raster(myimg, vp = viewport(layout.pos.col = 2, layout.pos.row = 1))
```
